title: Beautiful Newer Home For Rent Atlanta
posting_body: Dream Homes Consulting LLC offers a 2nd chance and rental Program for people who need a rental home, lease purchase home but have specific issues that deny you from getting approved; we can help.

We also help people who may not have problems but need assistance getting approved for a home, locating rental homes, or maybe looking for help with credit, financial rebuilding & coaching; we cover it all.
If you have issues getting approved due to low credit ratings, previous evictions, recent but closed foreclosure, or bankruptcies, Dream Homes is here for you.
Dream Homes works with many realtors around the metro Atlanta areas.
Dream Homes assist with your immediate home needs and long-term needs as well.
We'll help with your rental search, approval process, credit, and financial coaching all in one.
If interested in viewing please call:
All Homes Are Under A Program.
If You Are Not Interested in A Program, Dream Homes Is Not for You.
WE ARE CURRENTLY ACCEPTING SOME SECTION 8 AT THIS TIME
Dream Homes Enrollment information is listed below.
Dream Home's 2nd Chance Program; Rental Program Fee is $206.00 per person; give us a call for special rates for couples.
Our Program is for one or two years, depending on your situation; we work on rebuilding your financial and credit situation during that time.

In Dream Homs’s 2nd chance program, we create a plan for you to follow while in the Program to better your case, so you won't need a 2nd chance any longer; you're responsible for your deposit & amp; rent for each rental home.
Please call the number listed above
